title: Erik Truffaz - Walk of the Giant Turtle + bonus (2003) [FLAC]
description:
One of the best known trumpet of our time is wielded by Erik Truffaz - a genius of Jazz who is known for his rocky sounds and experimental melodies. If you are into modern Jazz with a rock flavor be sure to check it out!

The bonus disk is a recording from Jerusalem at the festival \"Songs of Freedom\" (July 22nd; 2003), where Mounir Troudi joined the Erik Truffaz Quartet to produce some *outstanding* music - a blend of jazz/rock/arabic music.

Check out my other torrents for folk, avant-garde, jazz and experimental music, all ripped in FLAC.

Unfortunately, my bandwidth is somewhat limited, but I will continue to seed for a very long time, so just be patient ;-)
